name: Forest Guest
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION

In this horror game (set in Siren Head) you must walk through the lush forest in search of the 6 pieces necessary to fix your car and escape from there.

The task will not be so simple, you may notice an evil presence that will prevent it.

CONTROLS

Movment -> WASD or Arrows

Jump -> Space

Camera -> Mouse

Run -> Left Shift

Pick Objects -> E or Choose key

Get on the car -> E or Choose key

Turn On/Off lightflash -> F or Choose key

Open map -> M or Choose key

Pause -> Escape

Updates -v2.2

Arrow on the minimap, Curves in the roads, Settings menu (keyboard and mouse), You can die, Changing textures, Collisions on the rocks, Steal another car's engine, Terrain - polygonal ,Improved house collisions, Pier, Animations and sounds in the car construction, The minimap does not disappear when opening the map, Sound effects (steps + flashlight), Run.
